description: Hidden factions operating across the Nikeverse timeline

factions.name: The Remnant
factions.symbol: A pig silhouette with a star where the heart should be
factions.description: Descendants of Nikes who fought in the Prime Era. They remember what others have forgotten.
factions.goal: Find Nike Prime. Restore the Champions. Preserve the true history.
activities: Graffiti in backgrounds of various dimensions
Secret handshakes between certain Charles variants
NPCs who say things that seem like flavor text but are clues
Hidden caches of Prime Era artifacts
factions.conspiracy: The Remnant might have already FOUND Nike Prime. They might be keeping him hidden because he's too dangerous to release unprepared.

factions.name: The Unravelers
factions.description: Nikes who WILLINGLY serve Nolem. Not corrupted—converted. They believe existence is suffering.
factions.goal: Accelerate Nolem's victory. End the suffering of existence.
factions.philosophy: To be absorbed by Nolem is to finally rest. Why do you fight sleep?
factions.conspiracy: The Harbingers aren't their leaders. The Unravelers have their OWN hierarchy, and it might include a corrupted Charles.

factions.name: The Lost Builders
factions.symbol: A gear with a pig silhouette inside
factions.description: What remains of the Scholar Nikes' legacy. They preserve knowledge and guide future generations.
factions.goal: Preserve knowledge. Ensure the truth survives. Guide worthy Collectors to hidden information.
factions.origins: The Scholar Nikes (Engineer, Nutritionist, Botanist, Computer Coder) scattered their knowledge before being hunted to extinction. Some may have uploaded consciousness into the Charles AI network.
activities: Hidden archives in 'Aeth'kai ruins' (actually Scholar Nike installations)
Guiding worthy seekers to critical information
artifacts: The Scholar's Map (fragments showing Nike Prime's location)
factions.conspiracy: Some Lost Builders aren't dead—they uploaded themselves into the Charles AI network. They're watching. Waiting. They know where Nike Prime is because THEY PUT HIM THERE.

potentialFactions.note: Factions that could be developed in future content

ideas.name: The Watchers
ideas.concept: Servants of Cthulhu who maintain 'interesting' outcomes

ideas.name: The Void Walkers
ideas.concept: Those who entered the Void Between and survived... changed

ideas.name: The Sixth
ideas.concept: Followers of the mysterious Sixth Champion who was supposed to be recruited
